narrative_directives.action: A disturbed Marcus, seeking leverage against all parties, makes a calculated revelation. Meeting secretly with Quintus, he doesn't speak of Varo's crimes—instead he whispers of financial irregularities closer to home. He shows transactions bearing Drusilla's hidden seal. Quintus's world tilts. His wife is entangled with the very forces he fights.
